name: Drive Medical Flyweight Lightweight Folding Transport Wheelchair, 17", Green Frame, Burgundy Upholstery

reviews.name: Drive Medical Flyweight Lightweight Folding Transport Wheelchair, 17", Green Frame, Burgundy Upholstery
reviews.reviewText:
this chair is perfect for taking my 88 year old mom to the functions we attend, shopping, dining out, whatever. My mom is 4'8" and her legs are short, and this chair fits her very well. This chair is very easy to move around tight areas, and is light weight for a wheel chair. The wheel brakes work excellent.
For those who are interested, the chair is rated for up to 200 lbs.
reviews.title: well built chair

reviews.name: Drive Medical Flyweight Lightweight Folding Transport Wheelchair, 17", Green Frame, Burgundy Upholstery
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for taking my 94 year old grandmother to her doctor appointments. Lightweight and easy to transport.
reviews.title: 04 March 2013

reviews.name: Drive Medical Flyweight Lightweight Folding Transport Wheelchair, 17", Green Frame, Burgundy Upholstery
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my dad for his 75th birthday as he will soon be undergoing knee replacement surgery and needs something to get around in. This is a great transport chair. It easily folds to fit our small trunk, has removable foot rests so my father can propel himself if he wants, and easily fits through the narrow doorways of our older home.
reviews.title: Excellent transport chair!
